items.summary:
Good morning and welcome to Best of 9to5Toys Weekly – a one-stop shop for all of the week’s best deals on Apple gear, Samsung and Android tech, accessories for smartphones and Macs, intelligent household upgrades, and even deals to update your wardrobe. The all-new Best of 9to5Toys collects all of the most notable deals and organizes them neatly into one handy catalog for you to peruse every Saturday morning. This week’s highlights include the first cash deal on the brand new AirPods Pro 3 alongside launch deals on Apple’s new iPhone 17/Pro and iPhone Air cases – but there’s a ton of notable deals on MacBook, Mac mini, and iPad live this weekend too.

more…

items.title: Amazon now offering first cash discount on Apple’s brand new AirPods Pro 3
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the brand new AirPods Pro 3 with a nice little launch deal at $239 shipped. We certainly didn’t expect to see a massive price drop on these right at launch, but for folks looking to jump in now, it is something. The first cash discount on AirPods Pro 3 is now live.

items.summary:

This includes the new silicone cases as well as the iPhone Air Bumper case and the new TechWoven models for iPhone 17 Pro and 17 Pro Max. You’ll find all of the TechWoven and Silicone models waiting on this landing page, and the iPhone Air models right here. We will dive into some details down below.

This week brought a wave of strong gaming deals, with huge markdowns across PCs and laptops. Alienware’s Area-51 gaming PCs led the pack, dropping by as much as $850. Several other gaming laptops and Copilot+ PCs also discounts alongside some notable offers on gaming keyboards, mice, and more. items.title: Electrified Weekly – Segway E3 Pro e-scooter launches at $600, RadRover 6 Plus e-bike at second-ever $1,199 low, and much more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Electrified Weekly – the best place to find all of this week’s best deals and new releases to electrify your life and protect Mother Nature. We’ve got another week of fresh EV sales while others from last week are ongoing, and among them all there are two standouts. The first being Segway’s launch of the new E3 Pro Electric Scooter at $600 shipped, which comes with Apple Find My, dual suspension, a 34-mile travel range, and more. There’s also the weekend flash sale on Rad Power’s popular RadRover 6 Plus e-bike that has been dropped to its $1,199 all-time low for the second time ever.

We also have the final days of several of our favorite power station brands’ current sales, but this week we were surprised by the new $1,659 low hitting Autel’s Home 3000 LiFePO4 Portable Power Station that features an AI voice assistant. You find those other sales, as well as savings on tools, smart appliances, robots, and more waiting for you below.

more…

items.title: Honda Unveils Its First Fully Electric WN7 E-Bike
items.summary:
Honda has unveiled its first-ever fully electric motorbike (e-bike), christened the WN7. The WN7 name is derived from ‘W’, inspired by the development concept “Be the Wind”, ‘N’ representing naked, and the number ‘7’ referring to the W7’s power class. The e-bike is currently open for pre-booking in the European market, with production set to […]

items.title: dbrand’s anti-yellow clear case, ‘idiot-proof’ screen protector, more now available for iPhone 17
items.summary:
Apple has officially unveiled the iPhone 17 lineup, and if you’re planning a preorder, you’ll want a case ready to protect it from day one. dbrand, as usual, is ahead of the curve – its new collection for the iPhone 17 actually went live days before Apple’s announcement. The lineup includes the updated Ghost 2.0 case, which dbrand guarantees won’t turn yellow over time like many other clear cases do. There’s also the fan-favorite Grip case for folks looking to get a customizable model with ultra-grippy sides. To round things out, dbrand is also offering its Prism Screen Protectors that fit right in with its cases. Hit the jump for a closer look and more details.
